question: Which phase of the National Supercomputing Mission (NSM) is to commence from January 2021?
explanation:
The third phase of the National Supercomputing Mission (NSM) will commence in January 2021, as per the Department of Science and Technology.
As per the notification, the mission envisages to take computing speed to around 45 petaflops. The 4,500 crore-National Supercomputers Mission (NSM) aims to operationalise nearly 50 supercomputers across the country in three phases.
